law.text: The review of administrative regulations promulgated by the Kentucky Board of Education under the authority granted by KRS 158.6453, 158.6455, and 158.782 shall comply with the provisions of KRS 158.6471 and KRS Chapter 13A.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 598, sec. 3, effective April 14, 1998.
